titles.title: Congratulating the American College of Emergency Physicians on its 50th anniversary.
Congratulating the American College of Emergency Physicians on its 50th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: Congratulates the American College of Emergency Physicians on its 50th Anniversary. Recognizes the accomplishments and contributions emergency physicians have made to advance the nation's health care system.
